definitions.definition: The nearly flat part of the shell structure of a tortoise or other animal, similar in composition to the carapace .
A half-jacket worn under the jacket for padding or for safety.
An ornamental front panel on a woman's bodice .
A film of air trapped by specialized hairs against the body of an aquatic insect, and which acts as an external gill.

main_definition: The nearly flat part of the shell structure of a tortoise or other animal, similar in composition to the carapace .
secondary_definitions: ( fencing ) A half-jacket worn under the jacket for padding or for safety.
An ornamental front panel on a woman's bodice .
A film of air trapped by specialized hairs against the body of an aquatic insect, and which acts as an external gill.
